    Class Description
    AnimationCache
    Internal animation cache to avoid recreation of similar Animation objects.
    AnimationConfig  
    AnimationConfig.AnimationConfigBuilder  
    AnimationFrames  
    AnimationFrames.AnimationFramesBuilder  
    AnimationRenderer
    Renders an animation for a GameObject onto the screen for the position where the game object is currently positioned in world coordinates.
    AnimationSpriteSheet
    Provides cached TextureRegion objects from a Texture provided to this sprite sheet.
